securer: Secure R Code Execution with Tool-Call IPC

Source: R/securer-package.R
securer-package.Rd

Wraps callr::r_session with a bidirectional IPC protocol for pause/resume tool calls, enabling safe execution of LLM-generated R code inside an OS-level sandbox.

The main entry points are:

  • execute_r() – convenience function for one-shot execution

  • SecureSession – R6 class for persistent sessions with tool support

  • securer_tool() – define tools that child code can call

See also
